title: Book Inspired by WE CAN DO HARD THINGS Podcast Coming in May
description: Glennon Doyle, Abby Wambach, and Amanda Doyle present a new book exploring "Answers to Life's 20 Questions."
author: Rebecca Joines Schinsky
excerpt: Glennon Doyle, Abby Wambach, and Amanda Doyle present a new book exploring "Answers to Life's 20 Questions."

After nearly 400 episodes of their instant-sensation podcast, Glennon Doyle, Abby Wambach, and Amanda Doyle are publishing a book by the same name. We Can Do Hard Things: Answers to Life’s 20 Questions is due out May 6 from The Dial Press. Inspired by one very difficult year of life, the We Can Do Hard Things book aims to provide a “guidebook for being alive—to help fellow travelers find their way through life.” Glennon’s compasses are her sister, Amanda, and her wife, Abby.
